-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Zendesk API for Haskell programming language.
--   
--   This is a library for accessing zendesk api using haskell bindings.
@package zendesk-api
@version 0.1.0.0

module Zendesk
runZendesk :: MonadZendesk m => ZendeskT m a -> m (Either ZendeskError a)
createUser :: (MonadIO m, MonadLogger m) => Name -> Email -> ZendeskT m User
getUsers :: (MonadIO m, MonadLogger m) => Source (ZendeskT m) User
getTickets :: (MonadIO m, MonadLogger m) => Source (ZendeskT m) Ticket
getTicketFields :: (MonadIO m, MonadLogger m) => Source (ZendeskT m) TicketField
data ZendeskConfig
ZendeskConfig :: String -> String -> String -> Maybe ZendeskTLSConfig -> ZendeskConfig
zendeskUrl :: ZendeskConfig -> String
zendeskUsername :: ZendeskConfig -> String
zendeskPassword :: ZendeskConfig -> String
zendeskTLS :: ZendeskConfig -> Maybe ZendeskTLSConfig
runZendeskT :: ZendeskConfig -> ZendeskT m a -> m (Either ZendeskError a)
instance [incoherent] FromJSON Via
instance [incoherent] ToJSON Via
instance [incoherent] FromJSON TicketFieldValue
instance [incoherent] ToJSON TicketFieldValue
instance [incoherent] FromJSON TicketField
instance [incoherent] ToJSON TicketField
instance [incoherent] FromJSON Ticket
instance [incoherent] ToJSON Ticket
instance [incoherent] Show TicketField
instance [incoherent] Show TicketFieldValue
instance [incoherent] Show Via
instance [incoherent] Show Ticket
instance [incoherent] CollectionKey TicketField
instance [incoherent] CollectionKey Ticket
